segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, her gaze fixed on the plate she’s drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice a steady stream of water pouring over the edge of the sink, creating a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me anxious to think about how she hasn’t even noticed the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast of the tidy garden outside and the chaos inside strikes me as odd.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little amused as I watch the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination to reach the cookie jar is evident, but he looks so precarious up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him, with her palm outstretched, adds to this delightful yet tense scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
